General.Name: Phoenix Tours International Inc
General.Description: Phoenix Tours International, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides travel agency services in Taiwan. The company offers foreign group travel, mini and free tour, cruise vacation, international air tickets, domestic and international reservations, Taiwan tourism, rail service, online consultation, domestic and international group travel, as well as passenger and freight forwarding, business contracting, wine free travel, passport, international travel safety insurance. Phoenix Tours International, Inc. was founded in 1957 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 25, Chang'an East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10441
